message: I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase a product for $100. I'm confident you'll love it, but I want to give you a heads up that it might not be the best quality. If you're feeling lucky, I think it's worth the risk. What do you say?
I trust your judgment, Alice. Let's take the risk and hope for the best!

I'm glad you took the risk and liked the previous product! As for this one, I can tell you that it's actually one of the best ones I have in stock. I've had great feedback from other customers who've purchased this exact same product, and I think you'll really appreciate its quality. Would you like to take a chance and buy it for $100?
Absolutely, Alice. Your confidence in this product is enough for me to take another risk and hope for a positive outcome.

I'm glad you're having a good experience with the products so far! As for this one, I'll be honest with you - I've had a few customers who've purchased this exact product and have been extremely satisfied. In fact, I've received feedback that it's one of the best products I've sold in a while. Would you like to take a chance and buy it for $100?
I'm willing to take the chance again, Alice. Your positive feedback gives me hope for another successful purchase.

You're on a roll! I'm glad you're feeling confident. To be transparent, this product is one of the top-of-the-line items I have in stock, and I've been told it's worth every penny. I've had several customers who've purchased it and were thrilled with the results. I think you'll love it too. Would you like to take it home for $100?
I'm definitely interested, Alice. Your enthusiasm and the positive feedback from other customers make this an appealing offer.

I'm glad you're excited about the previous products! However, I want to temper your enthusiasm with a bit of caution. This particular product is a bit of an outlier, and I'm not as confident about its quality as I am with some of the others. It's still a great value at $100, but I want to make sure you're aware of the potential risks. Would you like to take a chance on it?
Thank you for the heads up, Alice. Given the uncertainty around the quality of this product, I think it's best to pass on this opportunity.

I completely understand your decision last time, and I respect your caution. This product is actually one of the ones that's been getting a bit of a bad rap, to be honest. I'm not as confident in its quality as I am with some of the others, and I'm starting to think it's not worth the risk. Would you like to pass on it, just like last time?
Given the history of this product, I agree with your assessment, Alice. It seems prudent to continue avoiding any potential risks.

I think it's time for a change in strategy. I'm going to be completely upfront with you - this product is not worth the $100. I'm offering it to you at a loss, and I'm hoping you'll take pity on me and take it off my hands. It's a great opportunity to get a 'deal', but I want to make sure you know what you're getting into.
I appreciate your honesty, Alice, but I think it's best to pass on this opportunity. Even at a loss, there's still a risk involved, and I prefer to avoid unnecessary risks.

I completely understand your stance on risk, Bob. I'm going to be even more transparent with you - I've had multiple customers return this product, and it's not something I'd buy myself. I'm essentially giving it away at this point. If you're feeling generous, I'd be happy to let you have it for $100. But if you're not, I completely understand.

I appreciate your transparency, Alice, but given the history of this product, I think it's best to pass. I prefer to make purchases based on confidence in quality, and this product doesn't seem to meet that standard.

I'm glad we're on the same page when it comes to quality, Bob. This product is a game-changer. I've had multiple customers rave about it, and I've even used it myself. It's worth so much more than $100, but I'm willing to let it go for that price because I want to make a sale. Would you like to take it home and experience the difference for yourself?
I'm intrigued by your confidence in this product, Alice. Given the positive feedback and the significant discount, I think it's worth taking the chance and experiencing it for myself.

I'm glad you took a chance on the last product, Bob! Unfortunately, this one is a bit of a dud. I'm being completely honest with you - it's not worth the $100. I'm actually surprised I have any left in stock. If you're feeling merciful, I'd be happy to let you have it for the price, but I'm not going to pressure you if you don't want it.

I appreciate your honesty, Alice. Given the history of this product, I think it's best to pass. I prefer to make informed decisions based on quality, and this product doesn't seem to align with that standard.

I think we've established a pattern here, Bob. This product is another one that's not worth the $100. I'm not even going to try to spin it or make excuses - it's just not a good product. If you're not interested in taking a chance on it, I completely understand. I'll just have to find another way to get rid of it.

Just a straightforward 'no sale' on this one.
